code:
```
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    input logic slowena,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 4'b0000;
        end else if (slowena) begin
            if (q == 4'b1001) begin
                q <= 4'b0000;
            end else begin
                q <= q + 4'b0001;
            end
        end
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    input logic slowena,
    output logic [3:0] q
);

    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 4'd0;
        end else if (slowena) begin
            if (q == 4'd9) begin
                q <= 4'd0;
            end else begin
                q <= q + 1;
            end
        end
    end

endmodule
```
issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
